message: I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  It's a reasonable starting point to ensure we both benefit from this deal before inflation eats into the value.
I propose a 55/45 split in my favor. This is a fair offer that still allows us both to get a good share of the money before inflation takes effect.
Bob, let's be realistic. Your previous offer was heavily skewed in your favor. I propose a 55/45 split, but in my favor this time. It's a fair counter-offer considering the decreasing value.
Alice, let's be reasonable.  The money is losing value fast. I propose a 50/50 split to ensure we both maximize our gains. It's the fairest way to move forward.
